INKCAZELO:

ISebe loPhuhliso lezoQoqosho linikezela ngenkxaso kubavelisi bezinto zefektri abasakhasayo ngeZiko leNgcebiso yaBenzi bezinto zaseFektri/ Manufacturing Advisory Centre. Eli Ziko lingakunceda kwimigudu yeshishini lakho elincinci, eliphakathi okanye eliselincinci (SMME) ukuphucula ukhuphiswano nokukhula ngokwasekhaya, esizweni nakwiindawo zentengiso zamazwe ngamazwe.IiNkonzo ezinikezelwayo zihlanganisa:
* Iinkonzo zengcebiso ukuphucula ukukhula kwenkampani kwakunye nokwenza umsebenzi
* Inkxaso yolwazi lezobugcisa
* Inkxaso yolwazi
* Uncedo ekumiseleni imigangatho yexabiso kwakunye neyemveliso
* Ukuhlanganisa abaniki zinkonzo kunye namaziko eenkonzo ukuya kuma ngeevenkile ezithengisayo ukwandisa inkonzo yabo
* Ingcebiso ngentengiso
* Ulwazi ngokuphatha kwakunye nokufikelela kwezemali
* Ingcebiso ngokuphathwa kweshishini
* Inkxaso yokuphucula ukhuphiswano
* Inkxaso yokuphatha imeko yendalo
* Ingcebiso ngophuhliso lwendyebo yoluntu
* Uncedo lophahla lwengxaki kwakunye nenkxaso-mali yezinto ezifunekayo
* Ingcebiso kwimveliso kwakunye nokuphuculwa kwenkqubo.
